metadata.title: CVE-2025-21534 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Performance Schema).  Supported versions that are affected are8.0.39 and prior, 8.4.2 and prior and  9.0.1 and prior. Easily exploitablevulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 4.9 (Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
